TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ViewTechnology extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义设计器宿主所支持的技术集的标识符。

span.span: Defines identifiers for a set of technologies that designer hosts support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图适配器模型替换，并添加了功能功能; 但是，功能将保留向后兼容性和将来使用，如果你选择。The view adapter model replaces and adds functionality to the feature; however, the feature is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅".NET 形状库:: 示例设计器"Windows 窗体知识库中在http://windowsforms.net/articles/shapedesigner.aspx。For more information, see ".NET Shape Library: A Sample Designer" in the Windows Forms Knowledge Base at http://windowsforms.net/articles/shapedesigner.aspx. 定义可以指示要用于控制设计器承载的文档的显示模式的标识符。 defines identifiers that can indicate the mode to use for controlling the display of a designer-hosted document. 你只应在设计器宿主环境中使用的默认值。You should only use the Default value in your designer hosting environment. 在以前版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、枚举指定的用户界面模型根设计器支持的类型。In previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the enumeration specified the type of UI model supported by a root designer. 由于此模型不是可扩展的则应改用*视图适配器*模型。Because this model is not extensible, you should instead use a *view adapter* model. 视图适配器是适应到另一种类型的对象的类型。A view adapter is a type that adapts an object of one type to another. 例如，HTML 设计器可能会返回`DemoDOM`树作为其视图。For example, an HTML designer might return a `DemoDOM` tree as its view. HTML 设计器返回默认视图的技术。The HTML designer returns a view technology of Default. Windows 窗体承载环境将具有一个或多个适配器可用视图类。A Windows Forms hosting environment would have one or more view adapter classes available. 如果有这样一个类可以转换`DemoDOM`到 Windows 窗体控件中，主机应用程序可以支持此类型的设计器。If one such class could convert the `DemoDOM` into a Windows Forms control, the hosting application can support this type of designer. 如果未适配器可以处理从设计器的返回的数据类型方法，设计器的负载将失败，并且用户将看到出现错误。If no adapter can handle the data type returned from the designer’s method, the load of the designer will fail, and the user will be presented with an error. Visual Studio 具有一套用于提供视图适配器，以便它可调整到任何 UI 技术可扩展方案。Visual Studio has an extensible scheme for providing view adapters, so it can adapt to any UI technology. 第三方技术提供商也可以提供适当的视图适配器，并且马上就可以使用其对象模型。Third-party technology providers can also offer an appropriate view adapter, and their object models are immediately consumable. 有关使用查看适配器示例，请参阅".NET 形状库:: 示例设计器"Windows 窗体知识库中在http://windowsforms.net/articles/shapedesigner.aspx。For an example that uses view adapters, see ".NET Shape Library: A Sample Designer" in the Windows Forms Knowledge Base at http://windowsforms.net/articles/shapedesigner.aspx. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在设计器中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Default = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定默认的视图技术支持。

span.span: Specifies the default view technology support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根设计器可能会返回任何类型的对象，但该对象必须是与主机的技术的适配器兼容。The root designer may return any type of object, but the object must be compatible with an adapter for the technology of the host. 宿主环境，如 Visual Studio 提供了一种新的视图技术适配器中插入方法。Hosting environments such as Visual Studio provide a way to plug in new view technology adapters. Windows 窗体设计器的默认视图对象是实例。The default view object for the Windows Forms designer is a instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在设计器中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Passthrough = int32(0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示将视图对象直接传递给开发环境的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which the view object is passed directly to the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图对象必须实现的开发环境要求任何接口。The view object must implement any interfaces the development environment requires. Visual Studio 开发环境支持 ActiveX 控件、 活动文档或实现可通过 Visual Studio VSI （Visual Studio 集成） 计划 IVsWindowPane 接口的对象的视图对象。The Visual Studio development environment supports view objects that are either an ActiveX control, active document, or an object that implements the IVsWindowPane interface that is available through Visual Studio VSI (Visual Studio Integration) program. Visual Studio 开发环境对此视图技术提供支持。The Visual Studio development environment provides support for this view technology. 不一定能够使用在所有开发环境中对此视图技术的支持。Support for this view technology is not necessarily available in all development environments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology WindowsForms = int32(1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示由 Windows 窗体控件对象为根设计器提供显示的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which a Windows Forms control object provides the display for the root designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主用 Windows 窗体控件填充开发环境文档窗口。The designer host fills the development environment document window with the Windows Forms control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在设计器中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]
